DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read your company's places (conference rooms and room lists) for calendar events and other applications, on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Allows the app to read your company's places (conference rooms and room lists) for calendar events and other applications, on your behalf.

Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read company places (conference rooms and room lists) for calendar events and other applications, without a signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to manage organization places (conference rooms and room lists) for calendar events and other applications, on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Allows the app to manage organization places (conference rooms and room lists) for calendar events and other applications, on your behalf.
